title: Pattern Pricking, "La Boule de Neige", early 20th c
inscribed: Modele No. 354 de "La Boule de Neige" - Le Mans - fil No. 500 - 54 fuseaux
dimensions: Length: 49 cm [19.5] Direction in which the pattern was worked. Width: 6.5 cm [2.5"]
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Pattern pricking with design drawn on green paper. Life size xerox of lace made from the pattern glued to one end of the pattern.
